content: ** get this pattern for a new release sale of $2 00 50% off with the code lucybasket 1 ** expires february 19th 2026 > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog 2 this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future **description ** custom home decor has never been easier when you can crochet and with the lucy basket crochet pattern you ve got a texture rich design that goes well in any space in your home worked in one piece from the bottom up the lucy basket features recognizable stitches used in interesting and fun ways to create a bold texture repeated through the design the bulky hue + me yarn helps to heighten the stitches while also adding structure a great piece for any home as well as a valuable gifting option during the holidays this pdf includes both the graph and the written instructions the viewable pattern on divinedebris com only includes the graph 3 you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you
